courseDescription: An introductory course on blockchain technology and its applications.

lessons.name: What is Blockchain?
lessons.description: An introduction to the basic concepts of blockchain.

lessons.name: History of Blockchain
lessons.description: A brief history of how blockchain technology developed.

lessons.name: Blockchain in Finance
lessons.description: How blockchain is used in financial systems.

lessons.name: Blockchain in Supply Chain
lessons.description: The role of blockchain in improving supply chain transparency.
